org.mmbase.util

Class XMLBasicReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.util.xml.DocumentReader
      • org.mmbase.util.XMLBasicReader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XMLMMLanguageReader
    Deprecated. 
    use DocumentReader or DocumentWriter. Some code may need to be moved to DocumentReader

    public class XMLBasicReader
extends DocumentReader
    XMLBasicReader has two goals.
    • It provides a way for parsing XML
    • It provides a way for searching in this XML, without the need for an XPath implementation, and without the hassle of org.w3c.dom alone. It uses dots to lay a path in the XML (XPath uses slashes).
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Case Roule, Rico Jansen, Pierre van Rooden, Michiel Meeuwissen

      • getInputSource

        public static InputSource getInputSource(String path)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates an input source for a document, based on a filepath If the file cannot be opened, the method returns an inputsource of an error document describing the condition under which this failed.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file containing the document
        Returns:
        the input source to the document.
